content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter at (1.5,2.5) outputting to wooden chest at (1.5,3.5)
- Furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter at (3.5,2.5) outputting to wooden chest at (3.5,3.5)
Additional chest at (5.5,3.5) with burner inserter at (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Two parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter at (2.5,8.5) outputting to wooden chest at (2.5,9.5)
- Furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter at (4.5,8.5) outputting to wooden chest at (4.5,9.5)
Connected by transport belts from (2.5,8.5) to (4.5,8.5)

### Assembly Line System (x=8.5-21.5, y=10.5-15.5)
Complex production setup with:
- Copper cable assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Electronic circuit assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for item movement
- Connected by multiple belt groups for material transport

### Power Generation System (x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Complete electricity generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) providing water
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water (system 3483) and steam (system 3486)
- Electricity network (id=13736) connecting various electrical entities

ERROR TIPS

### Assembly Machine Resource Shortages
- Ensure proper supply chains are set up for assembly machines
- Copper cable machine needs copper plates
- Electronic circuit machine needs iron plates and copper cables

### Fluid System Connectivity Issues
- One offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) shows "No fluid present in connections"
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid producers and consumers

### Inserter Efficiency Issues
- Multiple inserters show "waiting for source items"
- Some inserters report "chest is full" warnings
- Design buffer storage and throughput to prevent bottlenecks

### Belt System Optimization
- Multiple belt groups are empty
- Ensure proper material flow through transport belt networks
- Review belt layouts to optimize material movement between production areas
